text: Method and Flow: Illegible and Inkstained
Method and Flow: Steady and Calm
Method and Flow: Cursive and Graceful
Method and Flow: Elegant and Breathtaking
Method and Flow: Masterful and Sagacious
Overcome by stress or nerves, your writing resembles that of a child - and not a particularly gifted one, either.
With a firm grip and clear mind, you lay your thoughts down on paper.
Countless days of practice and effort have lead to script that is both concise and beautiful.
It is said that only a truly tranquil mind can produce such astonishing, cursive script.
With expertise over the old styles, and newly developed innovations that will shape the course of the art, you will truly be remembered as a sage of brush and ink.
You can research two technology every spring.
[[b]]Method and Flow[[/b]] can be increased by assignments, character satisfaction, and rank.
[[b]]Method and Flow[[/b]] can be decreased by assignments, low satisfaction, and upkeep of schools.
• Gain a second reform at the highest tier
With simple, yet beautiful brush strokes, Zhang Chao invokes awe.
